alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cook and northeastern Lake Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, to near Dumbbell Lake, to near Split Rock Lighthouse, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Clear Lake, Basswood Lake and Dumbbell Lake around 200 PM CDT. Silver Bay around 210 PM CDT. Illgen City and Finland around 215 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Little Marais, Sugar Loaf Cove and Taconite Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
